Class Segment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Segment

  • public class Segment
extends java.lang.Object
    Segment Class - Creates a segment with two end points. A segment is a geometrical object composing of one dimension and two end points terminating the object. The Segment class allows for a Segment object to be generated using two Point objects. The Segment may be returned as a string listing the points or a boolean determining if one Segment is equal to another.
    Author:
    hs35563

      Constructors

      Construct a Segment with two default Points
      Segment(Point p1, Point p2)
      Create a segment with two points This constructor allows the user to create a segment object by specifying the two end points for the segment
